content.prompt: The primary purpose of sentences 4 and 5 of the second paragraph (“Among...actually are”) in the speaker’s line of reasoning is to

choices.label: argue for the importance of self-government
identify the reasons why men choose the cloistered life
distinguish different types and degrees of uselessness
explain the motivation of the man of action

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
